comments:
I was using 0.7.1 to edit an XML file. On 3 occasions I got errors when
inserting tags into a block of tag. The .log showed the following stack trace. I
suggest you visually inspect the code and add some guards to any array indexing
operations.

Nitin, even though ViewerSelectionManager is going away (which I suspect is the
root of this problem) ... is there other guards/protects we should put in place? 

(Or, pass bug on to base ui team?)
